citeinfo.origin: Daithi Stone, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, Berkeley, CA, U.S.A.
citeinfo.title: Weather Risk Attribution Forecast version 4 regions (0.5Mm^2 class) (v4.0)

descript.abstract: See Stone, D. A. "A hierarchical collection of political/economic regions for analysis of climate extremes". In preparation.
descript.purpose: Political/economic regions of approximately 0.5Mm^2 size for use in analysis of weather and climate extremes.
